messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine the Great Pacific Mall with 15 stores. Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Sephora are all connected to each other. Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Nike are all connected to each other. Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, and Target are connected to each other. Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, and Bath and Body Works are connected to each other. Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, and Target are connected to each other. Paris Baguette, H&M, and Zara are connected to each other. Nike is connected to Bath and Body Works. Levis, GNC Live Well and Target are connected to each other. H&M is connected to Zara. Sephora is connected to Bath and Body Works. GNC Live Well is connected to Target. You have been told that Sephora is now connected to Nike. From Starbucks, what is the path that yields the most reward? Please list the store names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify groups of connected stores:
Group 1: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora
Group 2: Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 3: Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Nike
Group 4: Marshalls, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Target
Group 5: Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 6: Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well, Target
Group 7: Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara
Group 8: Nike, Bath and Body Works
Group 9: Levis, GNC Live Well, Target
Group 10: H&M, Zara
Group 11: Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 12: GNC Live Well, Target

Step 2: Update connections based on new information (Sephora is now connected to Nike):
Group 2: Pete’s Coffee, Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 5: Carter Children, Nike, Sephora, Bath and Body Works
Group 1: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora, Nike

Step 3: Identify path from Starbucks to the most rewarding stores:
From Starbucks, connect to Group 1 stores, then to Group 5 stores, and finally Group 3 stores.

Answer: Starbucks, Paris Baguette, H&M, Zara, Sephora, Nike, Carter Children, Bath and Body Works, Chickflea, Baskins and Robins, Levis, GNC Live Well
